question: Which quarter demonstrates the strongest store performance based on the stacked area chart?

options.A: The chart cannot determine overall performance because it combines unrelated business metrics.
options.B: Q2 shows the strongest performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: Q4 shows the strongest performance with the highest total area.
options.D: Q4 shows the strongest performance with the highest social media engagement.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated business metrics (store visits, electricity usage, social media posts) into a cumulative area. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
